```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
blogs <- read_excel("tables/blogs.xlsx")

reactable(
  blogs, 
  #filterable = TRUE, 
  searchable = TRUE,
  # подсветка при наведении на строку
  highlight = TRUE,
  # отстутствие границы между строками
  borderless = FALSE,
  # на всю ширину / фиксированная ширина
  fullWidth = TRUE,
  # исходное количество строк на странице
  defaultPageSize = 10,
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE, 
  theme = reactableTheme(
    headerStyle = list(
      "&:hover[aria-sort]" = list(background = "hsl(0, 0%, 96%)"),
      "&[aria-sort='ascending'], &[aria-sort='descending']" = list(background = "hsl(0, 0%, 96%)"),
      borderColor = "#555"
    )
  ),
  columns = list(
    blog = colDef(
      cell = function(value) {
                                img_src <- knitr::image_uri(sprintf("blog_images/%s.png", value))
                                image <- img(src = img_src, style = "height: 30px;", alt = value)
                                tagList(
                                  div(style = "display: inline-block; width: 45px", image),
                                  value
                                )
                              },
      #searchable = TRUE,
      sortable = FALSE,
      resizable = TRUE,
      name = "Blog / Web page"
    ),
    link = colDef(
      #searchable = FALSE,
      sortable = FALSE,
      name = "Link",
      html = TRUE, 
      cell = function(value, index) {
      sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">%s</a>', blogs$link[index], value)
      }
    )
  )
)
```
